name: elm-oauth-middleware
description: An OAuth redirect server to hide the client secret from web apps.

scripts.build: cp -p src/config.json.template build/ && cp -p src/index.js build/ && cp -p ews/index.js build/ews.js && elm make src/OAuthTokenServer.elm --output build/elm.js
scripts.setup: rm -rf build elm-stuff node_modules && npm i -y && mkdir build && npm run build

author: Bill St. Clair <billstclair@gmail.com
